reviewText: Great for a kid's class at church. That's what I bought it for. Stays true to the Bible
But I deducted 1 star for lacking the accuracy the HB version had. Haman didn't even have a Haman hat (hamantash).
I showed this to our Children's Sunday School Classes.  The children learned a great deal about Queen Esther that they did not know before.  I would recommend this highly as a teaching aide.
